replies.body: Preferred Item Slots sounds amazing. I don't have to worry if my potions or wards are in their right place anymore.

Honest talk, Ahri didn't deserve the legendary skin. Soraka did.
Hear me out now:
Ahri is popular, yes. But she has so many skins with a theme to it, one of them already being pink. It's already slightly shocking she is getting a Star Guardian skin. I'm sure a lot of people are very happy about it, and I wouldn't argue that.
But I believe Soraka deserved the Legendary skin title more. Her skin looks very beautiful compared to Ahri's. I just wanted to say my opinion, I really don't want haters. Real talk, I despise Soraka and ban her every game. Hehe

Not to mention she's the STAR CHILD CHAMPION. Sigh. I like both champions but Soraka just fits the bill to the Star Guardian theme more than Ahri does. And I believe it has been quite awhile since Soraka has gotten a new skin like this. Overall I won't complain, Soraka's skin is much more beautiful than Ahri's is in my opinion for a lower cost.
with that logic aurelion sol is the stars and universe itself. still has no SG skins. guess the vibrant colors dont really suit him anyways

Great... Now i want a Sol Star Guardian skin or for him to be the villain they all need to fight... but rito missed blood moon ww even though his remake was the same time as blood moon event and it took them 2 blood moons before they made diana who should've clearly been in the first batch.

I just want to buy the damn skin NOW. Lol. As for the debate, I want SG Soraka, Syndra and MF before Ahri. And yes, The Soraka skin is beautiful.

So come on Riot, I am waiting to give you my money.
Why is the star guardians event like a patch away
Please refer to my comment bellow.
This is just me saying do control+f and then just type this guys username, Kairoptra, to find his comment if you don't want to scroll through looking for it.
Where is All For One??????{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Busy plotting to kill all might.
Iunderstoodthatreference.gif

I mean URF would be fun if your MMR in rank transferred with your MMR in URF... cause its kind of annoying when you cant trade with your teammates because they dont have most of the cheap champs/all champs. Also, about URF I tend to face a Maokai every game, and I have the worst champs =/. Sucks to have all the champs in URF. BUT WHERE IS ONE FOR ALL???
why are u playing urf to have a competitive experience.
Blood Moon >>> URF

I actually have my fill of URF after this event week. But hopefully they won't wait 6 months till it is released again. I am kinda waiting patiently for hexakill, or bridgewater (I think that's the name). Those two modes seem to be forgotten...
I'm certainly OVER poro king. I think we all are haha.

Hexakill Twisted Treeline is probably going to be back soon enough, it's fairly popular and Riot seems to like it. Hexakill SR is probably never going to come back, because it typically just made top lane a 2v2. Black Market Brawlers kinda sucked and I hope it doesn't come back. The fancy pirate bridge that replaced ARAM for a bit probably won't come back because it was a special event and some people had visual problems running it. We all are definitely over Poro King.
Black market brawlers is one of the BEST. I think youre thinking of Nexus Siege.

**Earn Starlight Tokens for completed missions on this custom map, and then craft those tokens into the New Horizon Ward and a Hextech Mystery Champion (random Champion Permanent). **

Really Riot? Permanent champions? _Really._  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
He's, probably just referring to the fact that giving people champions doesn't do anything for like, the 40% of that playerbase who already have them all.
or the chance of getting a champ you don't want.
I thinks it's closer to 9-10% not 40%...
I have all the champs and I barely play the game...

But that's just it ... the champions are free :\. Sure, you have to earn them ... but tbh, I have 70k IP and own all the champions I'm already going to own.

It's kind of a boring reward truth be told. I also already have like ... 4k blue dust, with no end in site on the accumulation of it as it's quite pointless xD.

Furthermore, there's no guarantee who you're going to get. So you may get all 450 IP champs, in which case, just play 4 or 5 games.

Not spoiled at all, just worthless to a large amount of people.
Seems like riot had a huge success with championship Riven 2016, if they are doing similar thing with PAX Sivir.
yeah except they up the price a few hundred bucks
Huge success, exactly.

Before anyone asks why they have two game modes listed, this patch is extra long; it will last 3 weeks instead of the usual two. Since the duration of Invasion is from the seventh to the twenty-fifth, it will go from when patch 7.18 would've been released had this been a normal patch through the duration of when 7.18 will actually be, ending just before 7.19 will be released.
No Kayn for blood moon? ;-;
Seems like the obvious choice, honestly.

Probably due to the difficulty of him getting to Shadow versus Rhaast. Most of the assassins in the mode are melee, meaning he would have an extremely hard time getting his Shadow experience, and Rhaast wouldn't really be able to benefit from the items in the mode.

Hopefully the SG skins come out right on Wednesday, I am so eager to get my SG {{champion:16}} since it's such an incredible skin. I wonder if the boarder that comes with it is when you buy it asap, or if you have to unlock it via event wise.
They said star gardians even/skins will be out 9/7/17. Can't wait for SG {{champion:103}}
pls dont tell me we have to wait another 2 weeks,i cannot wait for sg ahri and i was sure it would come out wednesday....

"This helps Zed control minion waves, split push, and find more windows to use his abilities more aggressively."
Just the thing league was lacking, more aggression.
With Ezreal having a Star Guardian skin, does this mean my dream of seeing Star Guardian Bard is possible?
I'm so glad they put in preferred item slots in, not just because of Zhonyas but also because I'm a weirdo who puts Tiamat on a mouse button.
Blood Moon event and no room for the new and brooding Kayn? I suppose with all the melee champs it'd be a picnic for Rhaast
I believe you have to be at least a partial assassin, and since Kayn could only go Rhaast, he doesn't _quite_ qualify.
He can still go shadow, just need to wait a bit
Oh right forgot about that...  But then again I feel like most blood moon games don't last that long.
was wondering the same

No it's Shakespeare.
Cannot wait for the new star guardians. :-) Please consider Star Guardian Sona! :-) {{champion:37}}
Urgot ult buff and a zed buff are you F****** kidding me.

urgot has no buisness being buffed, that dude is way too fucking tanky for the damage output he has / how much range that ult has, he snagged my top laner from behind her tower damn near half way to the inner to the middle of top lane. Completely stupid.
They really should have nerfed the range on it with this buff. That range can easily be really op. At least make it cost Urgot his flash to get in range once in a while

Bear in mind that he has to aim it, and the farther away he is the harder it is for him to land it.  When a player *does* successfully land an ult from a distance, it's a reward for skill.  If the targeting was like Pantheon's Q, it would be ridiculous, but as it is, it's just powerful, as an ult should be.
